entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.2°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

Dewpoint: -36.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Amount 4 cm in Whale Cove. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023
